title: Real-time Inventory Updates
description: As a warehouse manager, I want inventory levels to update in real-time so that I can prevent overselling and maintain accurate stock counts.
acceptance_criteria: Inventory is decremented immediately upon order confirmation
System reserves inventory during checkout process (15-minute hold)
Low stock alerts trigger when inventory falls below threshold
Inventory updates are reflected across all sales channels
System handles concurrent purchases correctly (no overselling)
Inventory adjustments are logged with timestamp and user
Dashboard displays current stock levels by product and warehouse
System supports bulk inventory updates via CSV import

comments.author: Database Admin
comments.text: Implemented database locking mechanism to prevent race conditions.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: Load testing completed. System handles 1000 concurrent transactions without overselling.
